name: FurAffinity - Project Fursona! + (Green)
description: A custom FurAffinity CSS inspired by Persona. Also an enhanced/optimized version of my "Project Fursona!" style.
additional_info: Last update: Fixed submissions-related messages. Hope you'll like the style! Have fun browsing your new FurAffinity !! If you have something to ask, or want to leave a kind comment, you can find me here: Cuteness-Overlord Also, that skin uses a lot of code from "Grey Rust" by Artex. and "Nocturnal V3" by iErrored. Be sure to check their work too!
